main.name: Pluvia☆Magica
main.supportDescription: Increases break bonus by 20%, and on enemy break, grants 5 MP.

support.name: Neo Genesis
support.supportDescription: Increases break gauge depletion (2). When 2 or more buffs are applied to self: Increases SPD by 25%. * Only refers to buffs activated by basic attack / battle skill / special attack / follow-up attack / counterattack / assist.

main.name: My Creations
main.supportDescription: Increases DMG dealt by 10% and ailment hit rate by 30%, and decreases DMG taken from enemies with at least 1 ailment by 5%.

support.name: Bebe-O'-Lantern
support.supportDescription:
Increases own ongoing DMG dealt by 15%.
Increases SPD by 15%.
On own basic attack, grants 2 MP.

main.name: Fiore Finale
main.supportDescription: Increases DMG dealt when targeting elemental weakness by 25%, and on battle skill use, applies shield to self (10% / 1 time).

support.name: The Universe's Edge
support.supportDescription: Increases special attack DMG dealt by 12% and ATK by 15%.

main.name: Hollow Woman
main.supportDescription:
On basic attack, advances action order by 10%.
Increases SPD by 20%.

support.name: Flame Waltz
support.supportDescription: Increases self-applied buff effects by 30% (* excluding MP recovery and action order advance effects), and increases SPD by 15%.

main.name: Tiro Finale
main.supportDescription: Increases SPD by 25%, and MP recovery rate by 10%.

support.name: Time Stop Strike
support.supportDescription:
Increases SPD by 20%.
On battle skill use, advances all allies' action order by 5%.
